segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0

segment.source: You can generate different reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities.
segment.target: You can generate different reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities.

segment.source: If you chose the Configuration Manager topology when you installed Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), reports are generated from Configuration Manager rather than from MBAM.
segment.target: If you chose the Configuration Manager topology when you installed Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), reports are generated from Configuration Manager rather than from MBAM.

segment.source: See Understanding MBAM Reports in Configuration Manager for more information.
segment.target: See Understanding MBAM Reports in Configuration Manager for more information.

segment.source: MBAM reports have many fields that you may want to be familiar with before generating MBAM reports.
segment.target: MBAM reports have many fields that you may want to be familiar with before generating MBAM reports.

segment.source: You can generate reports on enterprise compliance, individual computer compliance, and key recovery activity.
segment.target: You can generate reports on enterprise compliance, individual computer compliance, and key recovery activity.

segment.source: Other Resources for Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM
segment.target: Other Resources for Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM
